desc: Get ready for an inspiring day as we welcome a distinguished creator to our college! Join us for an engaging event where [Creator's Name], a trailblazer in [Creator's Field]
Crescendo eve is the event that marks the beginning of every fest in nsut. On day 1, Magic is created in the college premises when the music society performs
INDIA'S GOT LATENT inspired NSUT's own satirical and Open Mic Event.
Team of 1 or more people have to present a 8-10 min act. On spot registrations allowed. Google form will be released on instagram

DYNAMO is a competitive gaming tournament where players face off in the FIFA video game series in a Local Area Network (LAN) setup. Participants will play one-on-one matches, using their football skills and strategies to outscore their opponents

It is a bidding event in which we will invite teams with 2-4 members each and then to start off the event, there is a product of a particular cost and then we will give the team riddles/guesstimates and they have to reach to the number closest to the price of the product and the team get to a number the one with the closest to the correct answer will be considered as favorable
It is a Relay race with robots which need to pass the baton from one bot to another , A total of 3 bots will be provided per team

This is a fascinating and enjoyable game.  2 participants can play at a time. Two participants have to sit, two opposite sides of the table, facing each other. There will be 6 identical boxes on the table. 3 boxes will contain prizes and 3 boxes will be empty.
The Green Escape Challenge is a team-based competition where participants race through checkpoints, each featuring tasks related to environmental sustainability and social causes.

There will be a bowl of chits and in those chits we'll mention random items, like purse shoes socks t shirt anything. And the participants have to find the items in the given time and bring it to the table.

G1.Each team will have 3-4 members starting from a designated point (e.g., Amul). 2.Teams must answer questions to receive a map containing hints (riddles related to planets) for locating specific college spots. 3.If a team answers incorrectly, they must complete a task or dare to receive the map.

The Polymath : A search for  the next Renaissance Man!
